attributes.action: take legal action against Glasgow Rangers Football Club for failing to prevent its supporters from chanting and singing bigoted and racist songs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rangers Football Club has failed in its duty to prevent racist and bigoted behavior of its supporters over a number of years which has not only brought Scottish football into disrepute but also the people of Scotland. This illegal behavior continues to incite hatred and goes on almost unabated, as was witnessed during the Celtic vs. Rangers match of 31/09/2008 and must now be stopped.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
